author: Shut Up & Sit Down
description:
Coming December 2025: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/ivstudios/scales-of-fate

Scales of Fate by IV Studio transforms social deduction into a tight, strategic duel where deception meets deep decision-making. Pick demigods, plot your moves, and outwit your opponent—will you rise to Renown or fall to fate? This game keeps the sneaky, manipulative fun alive without the chaos of big-group yelling matches. Just pure, strategic mind games for two! 😈♟️

#boardgames #games #gamenight #gaming #tabletop #tabletopgames #shorts
title: Scales of Fate Preview - This 2-Player Strategy Game Will Test Your Sneaky Side! 🐍🎭 (BGD)

author: Shut Up & Sit Down
description:
Coming November 2025: https://www.kidstablebg.com/games/lairs

In Lairs, it’s a 2-player showdown to prove you’ve got what it takes to join the Adventurers Guild. First, you’ll craft a dungeon packed with traps, monsters, and treasures to trip up your rival. Then, you’ll dive into their lair, mapping the maze, dodging dangers, and snatching loot. With deduction, strategy, and a bit of luck, only one adventurer will escape with the riches—and a Guild membership.

#boardgames #games #gamenight #gaming #tabletop #tabletopgames #shorts
title: Lairs Preview - Build the Dungeon, Brave the Dungeon 🐉💎 (Board Games Direct)

author: Shut Up & Sit Down
description:
Coming September 2025: https://www.jeuxsynapsesgames.com/products/yokohama-duel?variant=46105972965625

Set in the Meiji era, Yokohama puts you head-to-head in a race to dominate Japan’s bustling new trade hub. Send assistants through the city’s districts, snag foreign tech and influence, and grow your business into an empire. With every move, you’ll need sharp strategy and clever timing to outplay your rival and claim victory in this game of trade and modernization.

#boardgames #games #gamenight #gaming #tabletop #tabletopgames #shorts
title: Yokohama Duel Preview - Some Straight 2-player Econ Heat 🐟📦 (Board Games Direct)
